sentences.sContent: Our saga, and my experiment, was over.
sentences.sContent_eng: Our saga, and my experiment, was over.
sentences.sCn: 我们的“传奇”，我的实验，结束了。

sentences.sContent: For Seymour, the saga of motherly love was anything but.
sentences.sContent_eng: For Seymour, the saga of motherly love was anything but.
sentences.sCn: 对于西摩来说，这是一个讲述母爱的传奇故事。

sentences.sContent: After my high school saga, I never really had a chance to dance again.
sentences.sContent_eng: After my high school saga, I never really had a chance to dance again.
sentences.sCn: 在高中的传奇之后，我再也没有真正拥有过跳舞的机会了。

synos.tran: 传说；冒险故事；英雄事迹
